api_list.name: detect
api_list.description: Detect over 100 languages from text.  The longer the text, the high the accuracy.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection14.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection14.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
